text: Rodrigo Masias (born March 11, 1981), is a Peruvian professional basketball player. He currently plays for the Regatas Lima club of the Liga de Basket de Lima. He represented Peru's national basketball team at the 2016 South American Basketball Championship, where he was his team's best shot blocker.Peru accumulated statistics | 2016 South American Championship for Men, ARCHIVE.FIBA.com, accessed 24 Dec 2016. ==References== ==External links== * FIBA profile at 2016 South American Championship * FIBA.com profile * Latinbasket.com Profile Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Peruvian men's basketball players Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Sportspeople from Lima
